review: For what it is, not bad, easy to setup and use.
author: RAC

review: Love getting my netflix on my big TV. I'm 68 years old and it was so easy to hook up!
author: Carol Dooley

review: I have an Apple TV and a FireTV Stick. Since getting FireTV Stick I don't use AppleTV anymore. The FireTV Stick is easier to use, has way more options and for some strange reason connects to the WiFi in my house better than the AppleTV does (and they're in the same room!). I would recommend it to anyone! I actually want to get another one for the other TV in my house.
author: Kristen McCusker

review: I'm really happy with the Fire TV stick . Have not tried the voice remote yet, but will soon.
author: Cheryl DeVries

review: After several weeks, it no longer works.
author: Brent Coffin

review: There was a problem installing but the Amazon help line was great.  Did not work with my sound bar so I bought the box, which I LOVE!!!
author: Eleanor Small "Networking Guru"

review: Easy installation and does not take long to use it. As I have prime account I have access to many other movies, tv shows.
author: Barnett
